title: How Many Calories in a BLT?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a BLT sandwich, including full nutrition breakdown like protein, fat, carbs, and easy tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a BLT?
assumptions: Standard BLT: 2 slices white bread, 3 strips cooked bacon, 1-2 lettuce leaves, 1 tomato slice, 1 tbsp mayonnaise; toasted bread, no extras.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, portion sizes, bread type, bacon thickness, and added ingredients like cheese or dressing. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard BLT sandwich contains about 420 calories and 15 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use turkey bacon instead of pork bacon

faqs.q: How many calories in a BLT sandwich?
faqs.a: Approximately 420 calories for a standard BLT.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a BLT?
faqs.a: About 15 g protein, mostly from the bacon and bread.
Yes, around 800 mg due to bacon and bread; opt for low-sodium versions to reduce.

faqs.q: How to make a lower-calorie BLT?
faqs.a: Use turkey bacon, light mayo, and whole grain bread to cut about 50-60 kcal.

faqs.q: Does adding avocado change BLT calories?
faqs.a: Yes, 1/4 avocado adds ~80 kcal and healthy fats, making total around 500 kcal.
